lines.text: You'll never get in the newspapers that way. You'll have to take his clothes off.
Do you mean... do you mean all of them?
Well, as many as you can, Miss.
This is a new experience for me, but I'll try!
You know the old saying, where there's a will, there's a lot of relatives.
How do you get into the newspapers?
Yes, I know that. But how do you suppose I might get into the newspapers?
First, get yourself a man. Then a reporter, and leave the rest to the typesetter.

[after discussing their roommate's lack of job prospects]
There goes an example of what a college education'll do for you. Poor kid.

[one of a very drunk foursome]
Nah, you girls aren't nearly as bad as you look.
